query:
WITH latest_metrics AS (
                            SELECT 
                                COALESCE(cumulative_transfer_amount, 0) AS prev_transfer_amount,
                                COALESCE(unique_account_count, 0) AS prev_unique_count
                            FROM metrics_plt 
                            ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC 
                            LIMIT 1
                        )
                        INSERT INTO metrics_plt (
                            event_timestamp, 
                            cumulative_transfer_amount,
                            unique_account_count
                        )
                        SELECT 
                            $1,
                            lm.prev_transfer_amount + $2,
                            lm.prev_unique_count
                        FROM latest_metrics lm
                        ON CONFLICT (event_timestamp) DO UPDATE SET
                            cumulative_transfer_amount = GREATEST(metrics_plt.cumulative_transfer_amount, EXCLUDED.cumulative_transfer_amount),
                            unique_account_count = GREATEST(metrics_plt.unique_account_count, EXCLUDED.unique_account_count)
